thi-ap11:7.2: duggaccañca → duggatiñca (sya1ed, sya2ed), daliddataṃ → daḷiddataṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap11:9.2: ubbhayojanamuggataṃ → uddhaṃ yojanamuggataṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | ubbhaṃ yojanamuggataṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
thi-ap11:13.2: sīvikaṃ → sivikaṃ (bj) | kevalaṃ (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
